title: Children's Winter Jackets
description: Two cozy winter jackets for kids aged 5–7. Washed and ready for use.

title: Blankets for the Elderly
description: Soft and heavy blankets suitable for elderly people during winter nights.

description: Set of 4 full sleeve wool sweaters. Sizes range from M to XL.

description: Various styles and colors. Suitable for adult women. Light to medium thickness.

description: Includes baby caps, mittens, sweaters, and socks. Soft and comfy for babies up to 1 year old.

title: Winter Boots Collection
description: Mixed-size winter boots for men and women. Gently used but in very good condition.
